name: Asciify Image
description: A module that allows you to convert images to ASCII art without native dependencies.

info.heading: How I Contributed
list: Migrated the image processor from lwip to jimp so that no native dependencies would be required and the module could run purely on JavaScript
Miscellaneous bug fixes

name: Axios Mock Adapter
description: Axios adapter that allows to easily mock requests.

info.heading: How I Contributed
list: Implemented a way for the module to mock redirects in a request

name: Color
description: A little library to handle color conversions and comparisons.

info.heading: How I Contributed
list: Added CIELab and XYZ color format support
Implemented color comparision functionality using the CIE76, CIE94, and CIEDE2000 color comparison algorithms
Miscellaneous bug fixes and documentation updates

description: A module for type checking values

info.heading: How I Contributed
list: Implemented the is.empty(), is.any(), and is.all() functions

info.heading: How I Contributed
list: Updated the simpleWeather dependency to fix a bug that would flood the console with errors

name: Nice Select
description: A lightweight Vanilla JavaScript plugin that replaces native select elements with customizable dropdowns.

info.heading: How I Contributed
list: Miscellaneous bug fixes

name: Node FFmpeg
description: A library that provides a set of functions and utilities to abstract command-line usage of ffmpeg.

info.heading: How I Contributed
list: Added the ability to configure the path to the ffmpeg executable

name: React Native Pulse Animation
description: A pulse animation component for React Native.

info.heading: How I Contributed
list: Implemented the pulseStyle property to allow for customizing the look of the animation
Miscellaneous code cleanup

name: Replace In File
description: A simple utility to quickly replace contents in one or more files.

info.heading: How I Contributed
list: Added the ignore option to define files that should be ignored

name: S3 Uploads
description: a WordPress plugin to store uploads on S3.

info.heading: How I Contributed
list: Documentation updates

name: Social Share Count API
description: A simple PHP script to fetch the count of social shares on various social networks.

info.heading: How I Contributed
list: Added the ability to specify services to fetch data from so that no unnecessary network requests are made
Added the ability to define request URL parameters so that access tokens can be included in the request

name: WinBox
description: A modern window manager for the web.

info.heading: How I Contributed
list: Made some changes to the development environment so that the library could be developed on non-Windows machines
Made it so the object instance is attached to the element so that it can be referenced later
Made it so that window sizes were dependent on CSS rather than hard-coded in JavaScript
Added the hidden option so that a window could be hidden when it is first initialized
Added a template option so that a windows markup could be customized
Added the autosize option so that a windows size could be dependent on it's content
Miscellaneous bug fixes
